Fandom

Class FandomStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fandom.FandomStats

  • public class FandomStats
extends java.lang.Object
    Can be used to receive statistics about a Fandom.
    Author:
    Mika Thein
    See Also:
    Fandom
